Module com.c195_pa.schedulingsystem

Package Controller

package Controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddAppointmentController
    AddAppointmentController is used to manage Adding Appointments
    AddCustomerController
    AddCustomerController is used to manage Adding Customers
    LoginController
    LoginController is used to manage logging in and logging attempts
    MainController
    MainController is used to handle the main logic of the application - Customer Management - Appointment Management - Viewing reports Lamdas are used in this file in the initialize method They are used to set nested data in the tableview cells Example: - Country and FirstLevelDivision Data on the Customers Model - Contact Data on Appointments Model
    ModifyAppointmentController
    ModifyAppointmentController is used to manage Editing Appointments
    ModifyCustomerController
    ModifyCustomerController is used to manage Editing Customers
